mapper.select: select sum(ta.ss_score) as ss_score ,tb.name ,ta.loginID as userID ,ta.li_no from tb_stdanswer ta inner join tb_userinfo tb ON ta.loginID = tb.loginID where ta.li_no = #{li_no} group by tb.name limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}

select ta.loginID as userID ,tb.name ,tb.hp ,tb.loc ,tb.user_dept ,tc.li_no ,tc.li_nm ,tc.li_type ,sum(td.ss_score) as sum ,te.em_nm ,te.em_date ,te.em_redate ,te.em_du ,tg.att_no ,tg.att_nli ,tg.att_mul ,tg.att_size from tb_subjectlist ta inner join tb_userinfo tb on ta.loginID = tb.loginID right outer join tb_lecinfo tc on ta.li_no = tc.li_no left outer join tb_stdanswer td on tb.loginID = td.loginID left outer join tb_employment te on tb.loginID = te.loginID left outer join tb_board tf on tb.loginID = tf.loginID left outer join tb_attachment tg on tf.att_no = tg.att_no where ta.loginID = #{loginID} and tc.li_no = #{li_no}
